comment: Once upon a time, mother and sibling who are poor, were living happily in the deep mountain.
Their father passed away early, but the mother was taking responsibility of their family’s wealth by selling handmade rice cakes at the market which located on over several hills.
Shall i start to make some rice cake?
[Rice cake making mini game]
Mother the rice cake is so well made!
I think it'll be so delicious!
Mother had a hard time to sell her rice cake at the market but she got strength from seeing her daughter and son who get along well.
It was late at night as usual when the mother finished working at the market and returning to home with the leftover rice cake.
I think the forest is darker today.

It was very dark in the forest like before she was use to walk but this time she hurried her steps.\nAll of the sudden, on the behind tree she began to see a black figure. \nGlowing eyes, sharp fangs. It was a giant tiger.
(Tiger growling)
It's a tiger!
The tiger was drooling and looked at the mother who smells like delicious rice cake and said.
I won't eat you if you give me a piece of rice cake!
[A mini game that gives you rice cake] \nThe tiger is threatening dreadfully! Please throw rice cake at the tiger!
(Mom screaming)
Mother gave all the rice cakes to the tiger but he was still hungry, and eventually he ate the mother.
Well, I'm still hungry.
Shall i go to her house?
The tiger who stole his mother's clothes to eat the sibling.
Dressed up like their mother and walked toward to the sibling’s house.
While the sibling were playing with toys at home, sister smiled brightly at the sound of footsteps she heard outside.
I think mom must have come back!
When the sister tried to open the door with joy, her brother who felt different from usual, held her hand and pulled back.
Are you sure that you are our mother?
At that moment, loud and husky voice came out from beyond the door.
Guys, Mom. open the door.
The brother who thought the voice is strange asked to tiger.
Then show me your hand through the doorstep.

below the doorstep, there was fluffy fur and thick jelly-like hands. It was obviously tiger's hands but he thought her hands had "swelled up from the hard work" that belief came from the strong anticipation to be reunited with his beloved mother in hurry, so he opened the door with belief of it.
Mom, you did a great job. I missed you!
Then, there was a huge tiger in his mother's clothes standing in front of his eyes.
Roar!!
When they saw a tiger drooling and trying to devour them and they began to tremble and looking around.
Brother, I think that tiger wants us because he's hungry... Oh! I see the rice cake basket that mom prepared, Mom said there is a rice cake that the tiger especially likes... What was that?
[Picking rice cake for the tiger mini game]\n You have to decide on the rice cake for the tiger. The outcome of the game depends on the rice cake you choose, and you can experience various endings.
Option 1. Red bean rice cake: Rice cake full of traditional sweet red beans.\nOption 2. Mugwort rice cake: Rice cake with a bitter scent of mugwort.
Here...this is the rice cake that you like the most !!!
The sister carefully placed delicious rice cakes made by her mother in front of the tiger.
The tiger was hungry, so as soon as he saw the rice cakes, he began to eat in hurry with joy.
The tiger who liked sweet red bean cakes continuously eat them, becoming more and more greedy with the endless rice cakes. The tiger's stomach slowly became full.
Time has passed... Finally, the tiger fell into a sweet slumber.
Now when tiger's sleeping sound reverberates and fill the room quietly, it was the chance for sibling.
When they open sleeping tiger's belly, there were mother that they have been looking for.
Mom!!!
The sibling and mother share the joyfulness of reunion briefly, but soon they were thinking how to handle with the tiger.
Let’s Fill up the tiger's belly with stones to make him feel full!
While the tiger was asleep, the sibling and mother walked around the house and collected the stones, and fill the tiger's big stomach with it.
The mother sewed the tiger's belly skillfully. After finishing everything, the sibling and mother held hands and quietly left the house to the faraway place.
The tiger who was asleep deeply without realizing his stomach had been split, woke up a few hours after sibling and mother had left.
Sighing...
Bcs i ate too much rice cake im so thirsty!
The tiger who was Feeling something strange but full and thirsty at the same time and left the house to search the well for quenching his thirst.
After wandering for a long time, the tiger found a well when he was so tired that he could hardly walk. He approached the well to quench his thirst.
(Gasping)
The tiger leaned into the well in a hurry with joy. At that moment! The weight of the stones in his body pushed him forward and he lost his balance.
OHOHOH..!!! AHHHHHHH~~AH
The tiger fell into the well.
AHHHHH!! PLS Save....me...
There is a story that the sibling and the mother who ran away while the tiger was asleep, are living happily in a new village and selling rice cakes.
(HAHAHA giggling)
Here... It's your favorite rice cake!!!
The sibling carefully placed delicious rice cakes made by her mother in front of the tiger.
The tiger was so hungry, as soon as he saw the rice cake, he started to devour it in hurry with joy.
Ewww!!! What’s this awful taste?!
He was a tiger who hated mugwort rice cake with a bitter scent of mugwort.
(Roaring from furious tiger)
The brother who saw tiger that rather be mad
Grabbed his sister's hand and ran out of the back door in a hurry.
Ahhhhhhhh!!!
After sibling fled through the back door, find a towering tree after looking around to see where to run.
Sister, let's climb up the tree over there! The tiger's thick feet will not make it up there.
So the sibling started running toward the tree.
When they arrived at the tree, they started climbing it to avoid being caught by the tiger.
Sister, I don't think the tiger noticed yet,\n don't worry and go up safely.
[A mini game that hits a certain number of space bars in a row within a limited time]
Later when the tiger realized that sibling had disappeared in the quiet room, the tiger came out from back door and found them on the tree.
Fortunately sibling had already climbed to the top of the tree. The tiger ran to the tree desperately although it seemed never to be able to climb with his feet.
See sister, I was right? A tiger can't climb a tree with his own feet.
Is there any way?
At that time, tiger saw the sesame oil and the axe in front of the his eyes.
I need to use this to go up! What should I pick?
The tiger found the ax start to climbing up the tree by axing it.
You guys don't move there! Did you guys think I couldn't climb the tree? I'll catch up soon!
Brother, what should we do! The tiger is coming up!
What? What should we do?
The sibling who had no choice but to look at the tiger coming up, cried with the feeling of catching a straw and prayed by begging hands to the sky.
God, tiger is trying to eat us. if you want us to be saved give us the new rope, but if you want us to be killed give us the rotten rope.
Then the heaven which recognized the pitifulness of the sibling, slowly lowered the new and rotten ropes.
What kind of rope should we choose?
The sibling who was thinking about which to grab between two rope that came down from the sky, grabbed one of rope.
But unfortunately the rope that the sibling caught was a rotten rope.
Brother, why is this rope swaying so much? I'm so nervous.
The rotten rope that couldn't withstand the heavy force began to cut off.
Sister, the roping is cutting off!
Brother, save me!
Eventually the rotten rope has cutted off, and the tiger can't do anything but just looking at the sibling falling down from the sky.
After that it happend there was only a calm wind left in the village.
The sibling who was thinking about which to grab between two rope that came down from the sky, Grabbed robust new rope.
Then the new rope began to rise to the sky.
Wow! we survived! we are going up into the sky!
What's that rope?
The tiger quickly climbed up the tree and said the same thing after seeing the sibling climb up to the sky in front of his eyes.
If I shout the same thing, the heaven will drop me a new rope?
God, if you want me to be saved give me the new rope, but if you want me to be killed give me the rotten rope!

Then, thunderstorms came down from the sky with the rumbling sound. \nThe Heaven who was very angry at the tiger for try to devour the sibling, gave only the rotten rope with the strong thunderstorms.
The tiger didn't know that and grabbed the rotten rope.
Haha! See! The heaven knows me. Shall we go get the sibling?
When the tiger was holding the rope and came up to them, they were surprised.
Brother, look over there. tiger is following us up into the sky!
Sibling, stop there! I'll never miss it this time!
At that moment. The rope that tiger was holding, made craking sound and start to cutting off.
Huh? It wasn't a new rope? It can't be cut off!
Ahhhhhhh, please save me!
Sister, the rope that the tiger is holding is cutting off! It seems that heaven gave him the rotten rope.
Eventually, the rotten rope that the tiger was holding broke,
And the tiger fell into the sorghum field and turned the sorghum red.
When the tiger fell, the sibling were relieved, and they continued to climb up the rope to the sky.
Brother, we survived. I'm really glad!
I'm so glad too. But where are we going?
After reaching heaven, the rope finally stopped, and the sibling asked god how to return the favor. Then, god began to talk.

Welcome, sibling. I have some mission to leave it up to you guys. Why don't you become the sun and moon of the sky and protect the sky? You, the younger become the sun and you, the older become the moon.

In this way, sibling became the sun and the moon, shining bright lights all over the world during the day, and also giving the sole light to those who pass by the night road at the darkness, so can make the world more brighter. \nand they lived happily together for a long time.
